actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance discharged in Senate.
Measure passed Senate, amended, in lieu of S. Con. Res. 95.
Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the overthrow on April 12, 1980, of the Government of the Republic of Liberia.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended, in lieu of S. Con. Res. 95) Condemns the summary nature of military trials in Liberia, the executions, and other actions which offend basic principals of justice. Expresses the sense of Congress that the President should communicate congressional concern that a continued disregard for internationally recognized standards of justice will seriously affect U.S.-Liberian relations.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the overthrow on April 12, 1980, of the Government of the Republic of Liberia.
